i1.name: Pit Grit
description: {{sbc|Innate - Heavy Hands:}} '''Sett's''' basic attacks alternate between a {{as|Left Punch|armor}} and a {{as|Right Punch|buzzword3}} [[on-attack]]. '''Sett''' begins attacking with a {{as|Left Punch|armor}}, and will reset back to it after 2 seconds of not performing a {{as|Right Punch|buzzword3}}.

'''Sett's''' {{as|Right Punch|buzzword3}} gains {{sti|range|50 '''bonus''' range}}, attacks at 8 times the {{as|Left Punch's|armor}} {{as|attack speed}}, and deals {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|5 to 90}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 15% AD)}} {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Heart of the Half-Beast:}} '''Sett''' [[health regeneration|regenerates]] {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|4|0.25;0.5;1;2|1 to 16}} health}} per second for every {{as|5% of his {{sti|'''missing''' health}}}}.
i1.notes: * The {{as|Right Punch|buzzword3}} does not grant {{as|{{sti|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}}, rather is fixed at {{as|800% of the {{as|Left Punch's|armor}} {{sti|'''total''' attack speed}}}} and it is unaffected by {{tip|cripple|cripples}} and attack speed buffs (i.e {{ri|Hail of Blades}}) for the duration.

q1.name: Knuckle Down
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sett''' gains ''Looking for a Fight'' for {{fd|1.5}} seconds and empowers his next two [[basic attack]]s within 5 seconds to deal {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}. The empowered attacks are guaranteed to be a {{as|Left Punch|Armor}} followed by a {{as|Right Punch|health}}, resetting his current {{ai|Pit Grit|Sett}} state (if applicable) and ignoring the usual time-out period for a follow-up right punch.
Activation will {{tip|basic attack reset|reset}} '''Sett's''' basic attack timer.
{{sbc|Looking for a Fight:}} '''Sett''' gains {{sti|movement speed|{{as|30% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} when he moves towards a {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy champion within 2000 units.
q1.notes: * {{Pending for test}}: ''Knuckle Down's '' interactions with {{tip|dodge|dodging}}, {{tip|block|blocking}}, and {{tip|blind|blinding}} effects.

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{ap|10 to 50}} {{as|(+ {{ap|1 to 5}}% {{as|(+ 1% per 100 AD)}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}}|Total Bonus Damage|{{ap|10*2 to 50*2}} {{as|(+ {{ap|1*2 to 5*2}}% {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AD)}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}
effects.str:
• Bonus Physical Damage: (+ % (+ 1% per 100 AD) of target's maximum health)
  • Total Bonus Damage: (+ % (+ 2% per 100 AD) of target's maximum health)

st_slices: (+ % (+ 1% per 100 AD) of target's '''maximum''' health)
(+ % (+ 2% per 100 AD) of target's '''maximum''' health)

subeffects.str: (+ % (+ 1% per 100 AD) of target's '''maximum''' health)

subeffects.title: Total Bonus Damage

w1.name: Haymaker
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Sett''' stores 100% of {{tt|post-mitigation damage|Damage calculated after resistances and modifiers.}} taken as ''Grit'' on his secondary resource bar, up to {{as|50% of his '''maximum''' health}}. Each instance of stored ''Grit'' decays by 30% every second after 4 seconds.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Sett''' blasts the area in the target direction, dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} to enemies hit. Enemies hit through the center take {{tip|true damage|{{as|true damage}}}} instead.
'''Sett''' also gains a rapidly decaying {{tip|shield}} for 3 seconds equal to the ''Grit'' expended.
w1.notes:
* The shield is created immediately and will decay after the blast delay. 
** The buff for the shield is named ''Down But Not Out''.
* '''Sett''' does not store {{as|Grit|gold}} from damage that was mitigated by a {{tip|shield}}.
* ''Haymaker'' is always cast from '''Sett's ''' position even if he is {{tip|airborne|displaced}} or uses {{si|Flash}} during the cast time.
* '''Sett''' will glow when attaining 90% {{as|Grit|gold}}. Casting ''Haymaker'' at this amount has a different visual effect.
[[File:90%_Grit_Sett.png|thumb|left|'''Sett''' will turn {{color|#FFDF00|'''golden'''}} ''(base skin)''.]]

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Physical / True Damage|{{ap|80 to 160}} (+ 25% {{as|(+ 10% per 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} of expended ''Grit'')}}
effects.str: • Physical / True Damage: (+ 25% (+ 10% per 100 bonus AD) of expended Grit)

e1.name: Facebreaker
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sett''' {{tip|airborne|pulls in}} enemies at his front and back, dealing them {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 50% for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
If ''Facebreaker'' affects at least one enemy on each side, all enemies are {{tip|stun|stunned}} for 1 second upon landing.
e1.notes:
* '''Sett''' will attempt to basic attack the closest target after ''Facebreaker''.
* A target will rebound to '''Sett's''' attack range.
* There is a smaller affected area at '''Sett's''' sides, the indicator does not illustrate this for practical reasons.
* {{Pending for test}}: If the single target on either opposite side is protected by a {{tip|spell shield}}, ''Facebreaker'' will not {{tip|stun}}.

r1.name: The Show Stopper
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sett''' {{tip|suppression|suppresses}} the target enemy {{tip|champion}} and {{tip|dashes}} {{tip|unstoppably}} a {{tt|fixed distance|400 units past target location}} toward and past them, {{tip|attached|attaching}} the target to him when he reaches them and carrying them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds before slamming them into the ground.
Enemies within the impact area take {{as|physical damage}}, reduced by up to 40% at the edge, and are {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 99% for 1 second.
''The dash will prematurely end upon reaching a wall that cannot be dashed through.''
r1.notes:
* '''Sett''' lands 200 units farther from the impact, the damage is applied after the time it takes to reposition.
* If '''Sett''' dies during ''The Show Stopper'', the ability is interrupted and the target detaches and the {{tip|suppression}} ends immediately.
** However, if he enters {{tip|resurrection}}, the {{tip|dash}} is not stopped and he will continue performing the ability while the target is still attached and suppressed. This only occurs while the target is attached. If the ''resurrection'' occurs before the attach, ''The Show Stopper'' is interrupted instantly and the suppression ends after a very brief delay.
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}}, {{tip|cc-immune|crowd control immunity}}, {{tip|unstoppable|unstoppability}}, the target's {{tip|death}}, as well as {{tip|cleanse|cleansing}} the suppression prevent '''Sett''' from carrying his target but will not interrupt ''The Show Stopper''.
** {{tip|Cleanse|Cleansing}} the {{tip|suppression}} will prevent or remove the {{tip|attached|attachment}} based on if it occurred before or after the grab.
* The target cannot be {{tip|knockdown|knocked down}} during ''The Show Stopper''.
* ''The Show Stopper'' uses a [[File:Critical strike icon.png|20px|link=]] [[Critical Strike#Cosmetic critical strikes|cosmetic critical strike]] to all enemies damaged in the epicenter.
